overview: Fredrick Waite has more than 20 years of insurance and technology experience, as well as a successful entrepreneurial track record. He co-founded two successful insurance technology corporations â€“ Access Coverage Corp (sold to The Hartford) and BCF Technology (sold to AMS/Vertafore) â€“ that developed and deployed software for multi-carrier underwriting, web services, connectivity, and integration. BCF built the AMS system, TransactNOW, used by many of the top 100 P&C insurance carriers. Fred also sits on the boards of numerous companies in and out of insurance.
